description: FTM files are saved in a proprietary format that can only be opened and edited with FamiTracker. However, songs created with FamiTracker can be exported to standard .WAV files or .NSF audio files.
NOTE: The name FamiTracker comes from "Famicom," which was the Japanese name for the original Nintendo system.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ftm file in MakeMusic Finale
images.caption: FTM file open in MakeMusic Finale
